name: Snot
description: '''Edy Junior Edouard''' (born December 16, 1997), known professionally as '''Snot''' (stylized '''$NOT'''), is an American [[rapper]] and [[singer-songwriter]]. Born in New York City, he moved to [[Lake Worth Beach, Florida]] at seven years old, where he would begin his rap career through [[SoundCloud]] in 2016. Snot rose to fame with the release of his breakout single "Gosha" in September 2018. As of 2019, he is currently signed to [[300 Entertainment]].
